item.title: Sync issues: iPhone not detected by iTunes (Windows)
item.description: Note that this is for Windows only! Some people have been experiencing this problem lately: You plugin in your iPhone, the Camera detected window pops up, iTunes may even open, but the iPhone doesn't sync or even show in the sidebar! Here is how to fix it: With the iPhone plugged it, close iTunes Go to your Control Panel Open up Administrative Tools (This name may vary depending on your language.
